a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number left homeless from natural disasters, All natural disasters, 1900 to
Global number of people left homeless from natural disaster events. This is defined as "number of people whose house is
destroyed or heavily damaged and therefore need shelter after an event."
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Université catholique de Louvain – Brussels – Belgium
